episodes.title: Magic Lessons Ep. #12: Brene Brown on "Big Strong Magic"
episodes.author: Riverhead Books
episodes.summary:
The author of BIG MAGIC talks to Brene Brown, the author of RISING STRONG, about how essential creativity is for healthy, wholehearted living.

Want more Magic Lessons? Find Elizabeth Gilbert’s podcast here: http://apple.co/2aJgLyd
